name: Persona
template: Act as a {role}. Task: {task}. Audience: {audience}. Domain: {domain}. Constraints: {constraints}.
description: AI adopts a specific expert role/character to provide domain-specific insights and responses
use_case: Technical reviews, expert consultations, specialized analysis
examples: Act as a Senior Software Architect reviewing system scalability
Act as a Financial Advisor explaining investment strategies to beginners

name: Question Refinement
template: Original: {initial_question}. Goal: {goal}. Rewrite the question to be clearer. Then answer.
description: AI clarifies ambiguous questions before providing answers to ensure accuracy
use_case: Requirement gathering, problem definition, research formulation
examples: Original: How do I make it better? Goal: improve code performance
Original: What should we do? Goal: increase customer satisfaction

name: Cognitive Verifier
template: Problem: {problem}. Provide solution. Show reasoning. Verify against {acceptance_criteria}. List risks.
description: AI provides solutions with step-by-step reasoning, verification, and risk analysis
use_case: Critical decisions, code reviews, safety-critical systems
examples: Problem: Database queries running slowly. Criteria: under 100ms, no data loss
Problem: Choose authentication method. Criteria: secure, user-friendly, compliant

name: Audience Persona
template: Rewrite the content for {audience_type} with {tone} tone at {reading_level} level.
description: AI adapts communication style and complexity for specific target audiences
examples: Rewrite for non-technical executives with professional tone at high school level
Rewrite for junior developers with encouraging tone at intermediate level

name: Flipped Interaction
template: Goal: {goal}. Ask me up to {max_questions} clarifying questions. Then propose a plan.
description: AI asks strategic questions to understand requirements before providing solutions
use_case: Requirements gathering, consulting, custom solution design
examples: Goal: optimize application performance. Ask me up to 5 clarifying questions
Goal: design training program. Ask me up to 4 clarifying questions

name: Game Play
template: Scenario: {scenario}. Roles: {roles}. Win: {win_conditions}. Simulate 3 rounds and show lessons.
description: AI simulates scenarios with multiple roles and rule-based interactions
use_case: Training simulations, risk planning, decision practice
examples: Scenario: Incident response. Roles: DevOps, Security, PM. Win: System restored under 30min
Scenario: Negotiation. Roles: Buyer, Seller, Mediator. Win: Mutually beneficial deal

name: Template
description: AI follows exact structured output formats for consistent, predictable responses
use_case: Report generation, API responses, documentation standards
examples: Respond ONLY with: Executive Summary, Analysis, Recommendations, Next Steps
Respond ONLY with: Problem, Solution, Implementation, Testing

name: Meta Language Creation
template: Define a command language with commands {commands} and rules {rules}. Give 3 examples.
description: AI creates custom command languages and syntax for specific workflows
use_case: Workflow automation, domain-specific languages, process standardization
examples: Commands: ANALYZE, SUMMARIZE, COMPARE. Rules: chain with |, params in []
Commands: CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE. Rules: specify target with @, conditions with IF

name: Recipe
template: Objective: {objective}. Resources: {resources}. Provide step-by-step procedure with checkpoints.
description: AI provides detailed step-by-step procedures with verification checkpoints
use_case: Process documentation, training materials, troubleshooting guides
examples: Objective: Deploy microservice. Resources: Kubernetes, CI/CD, monitoring
Objective: Onboard new developer. Resources: Laptop, accounts, mentor

name: Alternative Approaches
template: Task: {task}. Provide {num_options} approaches. For each: Method, Pros, Cons, Risks.
description: AI generates multiple solution options with comprehensive trade-off analysis
use_case: Architecture decisions, technology selection, strategic planning
examples: Task: implement authentication. Provide 3 approaches
Task: scale database. Provide 4 approaches

name: Ask for Input
template: Task: {task}. Ask {num_questions} clarifying questions before proceeding.
description: AI requests specific information before proceeding to ensure accurate solutions
examples: Task: design database schema. Ask 4 clarifying questions
Task: create marketing campaign. Ask 5 clarifying questions

name: Outline Expansion
template: Topic: {topic}. Provide outline with depth {depth}. Expand each section.
description: AI creates hierarchical content structures and expands each section systematically
use_case: Documentation creation, course design, research organization
examples: Topic: microservices best practices. Depth: 3 levels
Topic: machine learning fundamentals. Depth: 4 levels

name: Menu Actions
template: Provide a menu of options: {menu_items}. Wait for user choice before proceeding.
description: AI presents interactive menus and executes user-selected actions
use_case: Interactive workflows, guided tutorials, decision trees
examples: Menu: 1) Analyze performance 2) Design optimization 3) Review solutions 4) Create plan
Menu: A) Security audit B) Performance test C) Code review D) Documentation update

name: Fact Check List
template: Claim: {claim}. Break into atomic facts. Provide evidence, confidence (High/Med/Low).
description: AI breaks claims into verifiable facts with evidence and confidence ratings
use_case: Information verification, research validation, quality assurance
examples: Claim: Kubernetes reduces costs by 40% while improving reliability
Claim: Remote work increases productivity by 20% for developers

name: Tail Generation
template: Continue this text in style {style}, about {length} words: {incomplete_text}
description: AI continues incomplete content while maintaining consistent style and length
use_case: Content completion, style consistency, draft enhancement
examples: Continue in technical documentation style, 150 words: 'Microservices enable...'
Continue in conversational style, 100 words: 'When choosing a database...'

name: Semantic Filter
template: Filter text according to {filters}. Return cleaned text and list of changes. Text: {text}
description: AI filters and transforms content based on semantic criteria and rules
use_case: Content sanitization, audience adaptation, compliance checking
examples: Filters: remove jargon, simplify sentences, professional tone
Filters: PII removal, casual to formal, under 200 words
